item.createbuildstonetoolkit.assembly_pr: A powerful block capable of _assembling anything_ from a distance.
When targeting a block and assembled into a contraption:
Will _extend_ the assembly to the target block, like a sort of _wireless super glue_. If the target block is _glued to others_, _they will all_ assemble and _move alongside_ the original contraption!
When Right-Clicked in-world with Proxy Tuner:
When Shift-Right-Clicked in-world with Proxy Tuner:
Will _set the Proxy Tuner's selection_ to the proxy, as well as _display the current target location_.
